document_data.name: ''Dragonheir Clans''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dragonheir Clans''''' was an [[Abeir]]an book that chronicled the story of the [[Dragonheir]]s of the [[Sword Lands]], and recorded the genealogy of every Dragonheir clan that had existed.
document_data.History: In [[1479 DR]], the book came into possession of the adventuress [[Jada Marlserpent]], the last survivor of [[Clan Marlserpent]]. Before that, the book was owned by a merchant of [[Harimmon]], [[Shander Harimdor]].
